description:
{RHelp Topic{W: Mazreki{x

The Mazreki are a demonic, sinister race. A cross between elves and
demons, they are highly intelligent and attuned to magic. Although demon
blood runs in their veins they do not possess the great strength true demons
do, only their magical abilities are close to matching their demon kind that
and their appearance are the only similiarities between the two. Noone is
quite sure how this race came into exsistance, it is rumored however that
they were some failed experiment performed by a god who is less than sane.
The Mazreki reside within the mountian range known as the Twilight Peaks. A
dreadful place of death and darkness the Twilight Peaks are a wall of
mountains that are made up of jagged and sharp black rock. Only a handful of
the deadliest and hardiest of plants and animals can survive within the
confines of the Twilight Peaks, the Mazreki being the deadliest and fiercest
of all. The Mazreki, although quite evil, have a strict hierarchy and lawful
society. Their hierarchy is determined by age, because the older a Mazreki
gets the more powerful and stronger it becomes. Mareki live for long periods
of time and usually die of treachery rather than of old age. Age can be
determined by the length of their horns that extend from their foreheads.
The longer the horns the older the Mazreki is. Besides the horns Mazreki
have leathery bat-like wings, long whip-like tails and razor sharp talons.
Although they have wings, they are not strong enough to fly. They can break
long falls and leap great heights with the aid of their wings, some can even
fly for short distances but for the most part Mazreki are fairly weak
physically. They are a slim race that stand from 5'5" to about 6'0". A fine
black, brown, or grey fur covers their bodies. They have red, pink, or
violet eyes. Athough weak physically they have an unnatural constitution
that gives them amazing resistance to disease and they regenerate almost as
fast as a troll. This regeneration and ability for magic makes them quite
dangerous to encounter. When apart of a multirace adventuring group they
usually lead for the other evil races fear them, except the drow. Drow and
Mazreki have a healty respect for each other and get along with each other
well, or as well as evil races do.
